price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߛߊ߲ ߛߍ߲ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߥߎ߬ߟߋ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߦߏ߫ ߓߎߙߊ߲ߡߊ
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ وَرۡدَةٗ كَٱلدِّهَانِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā inshaqqati al-samāu fakānat wardatan kal-dihāni
